name: Randy Learns Science
description:
If you wanna play this in a web browser, especially if you're a mobile device user, go play the game over on Newgrounds - there's Medals too!

When it's time to Learn, Randy's your Concern!

Enter the world of Randy, where children can have fun and actually learn Science too!

Never miss an atom in your child's education! Randy's here to supplement what your child's missing.

Do you hate it when your kid isn't INTERACTING with their learning? Those worries are in the past!

In the Randy Learns... line of games, children learn the fundementals of how the world works!

Great educational adventures await!

Oh boy!

Made for the Newgrounds Flash Forward jam, which is showing off Ruffle's emulation of Adobe Flash. (Yep, this is a Flash game!)

LET'S PLAYERS: Capture the whole game window. You'll thank me later.

I hope you like what I've done here. It's an interesting little experience and I'm happy with how it came out given the two month period of working on it off and on. The buzz about Ruffle has been very creatively inspiring. Thank you to the Ruffle and Newgrounds team, and go play some of the other entries to this lil' game jam!

Be wary as you learn.

-Dungeonation
